content:
That's great to hear! It's amazing how a simple furniture rearrangement can make a big impact on the feel of a room. Swapping the positions of the armchair and coffee table was a great move, as it can help create a more open and airy feel by changing the traffic path and visual flow of the room.

I'm glad you're enjoying the new layout! Rearranging furniture can be a fun and creative process, and it's great that you're experimenting with different configurations to find what works best for you.

If you don't mind me asking, what inspired you to make the change? Was there something specific that wasn't working for you in the old layout, or did you just want to try something new?
